    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public Fusiontables.Column.Delete delete(String tableId,
                                String columnId)
                                  throws IOException
        Deletes the column. Create a request for the method "column.delete". This request holds the parameters needed by the the fusiontables server. After setting any optional parameters, call the AbstractGoogleClientRequest.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.
        Parameters:
        tableId - Table from which the column is being deleted.
        columnId - Name or identifier for the column being deleted.
        Returns:
        the request
        Throws:
        IOException

      • get

        public Fusiontables.Column.Get get(String tableId,
                          String columnId)
                            throws IOException
        Retrieves a specific column by its id. Create a request for the method "column.get". This request holds the parameters needed by the the fusiontables server. After setting any optional parameters, call the AbstractGoogleClientRequest.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.
        Parameters:
        tableId - Table to which the column belongs.
        columnId - Name or identifier for the column that is being requested.
        Returns:
        the request
        Throws:
        IOException

      • insert

        public Fusiontables.Column.Insert insert(String tableId,
                                Column content)
                                  throws IOException
        Adds a new column to the table. Create a request for the method "column.insert". This request holds the parameters needed by the the fusiontables server. After setting any optional parameters, call the AbstractGoogleClientRequest.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.
        Parameters:
        tableId - Table for which a new column is being added.
        content - the Column
        Returns:
        the request
        Throws:
        IOException

      • list

        public Fusiontables.Column.List list(String tableId)
                              throws IOException
        Retrieves a list of columns. Create a request for the method "column.list". This request holds the parameters needed by the the fusiontables server. After setting any optional parameters, call the AbstractGoogleClientRequest.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.
        Parameters:
        tableId - Table whose columns are being listed.
        Returns:
        the request
        Throws:
        IOException

      • patch

        public Fusiontables.Column.Patch patch(String tableId,
                              String columnId,
                              Column content)
                                throws IOException
        Updates the name or type of an existing column. This method supports patch semantics. Create a request for the method "column.patch". This request holds the parameters needed by the the fusiontables server. After setting any optional parameters, call the AbstractGoogleClientRequest.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.
        Parameters:
        tableId - Table for which the column is being updated.
        columnId - Name or identifier for the column that is being updated.
        content - the Column
        Returns:
        the request
        Throws:
        IOException

      • update

        public Fusiontables.Column.Update update(String tableId,
                                String columnId,
                                Column content)
                                  throws IOException
        Updates the name or type of an existing column. Create a request for the method "column.update". This request holds the parameters needed by the the fusiontables server. After setting any optional parameters, call the AbstractGoogleClientRequest.execute() method to invoke the remote operation.
        Parameters:
        tableId - Table for which the column is being updated.
        columnId - Name or identifier for the column that is being updated.
        content - the Column
        Returns:
        the request
        Throws:
        IOException
